location.description: Highway 5 North, near Old Chelsea exit

sighting.description: Saw blue Honda Civic heading north on Highway 5. Couldn't see plate clearly but looked like ABC series.
sighting.confidence_notes: Vehicle matches description. Direction consistent with witness report. Recent sighting (27 min after abduction).

caller_details.additional_info: Caller was driving southbound, saw vehicle pass in opposite lane

location.description: Rest stop on Highway 5 North, km marker 28

sighting.description: Saw young girl matching Emma's description at rest stop. She was with an adult male, black hoodie. Girl looked uncomfortable. They got into a blue Honda sedan.
sighting.vehicle_match: Blue Honda sedan, couldn't see full plate but started with 'A'
sighting.child_description_match: Brown hair, pink jacket - exact match to alert
sighting.confidence_notes: Direct sighting of child matching description. Location is logical given timeline (33 min travel at highway speeds). Witness noticed child appeared uncomfortable.

caller_details.reliability: Verified user - 3 previous valid tips submitted
caller_details.additional_info: Caller is a school teacher, familiar with children's behavior. Noted child wasn't crying but seemed withdrawn. Male seemed in a hurry.

tips.photo_quality: Low - taken from distance, shows blue vehicle and two figures

sighting.description: Blue car at gas pump. Couldn't see inside clearly. Plate might have had ABC but not sure.
sighting.confidence_notes: Very vague. Location is far from probable routes. Timing would require sustained high speed. No child sighting.

caller_details.additional_info: Caller saw AMBER alert on highway sign, thought they might have seen the car

sighting.description: Saw blue Honda in parking lot. Child in back seat crying. Man went into mall. Vehicle still there.
sighting.vehicle_match: Blue Honda - year/model matches alert description
sighting.child_description_match: Brown hair, couldn't see clothing clearly through window
sighting.confidence_notes: Strong vehicle match including partial plate. Child sighting confirmed. Location plausible - could have circled back. Child in distress (crying).

caller_details.reliability: Caller remained on scene, flagged down security
caller_details.additional_info: Mall security has been notified. Vehicle is in parking spot B-47. Caller is maintaining visual contact from safe distance.

tips.urgency: CRITICAL - Active sighting, vehicle stationary, suspect temporarily away from vehicle

tip_categories.vehicle_only: Saw vehicle matching description, no child sighting
tip_categories.child_sighting: Direct sighting of child matching description
tip_categories.partial_match: Some details match but incomplete information
tip_categories.active_scene: Real-time sighting with vehicle/suspect still present

verification_guidelines.high_confidence: Child sighting + vehicle match + location plausibility + timing consistency
verification_guidelines.medium_confidence: Vehicle match + reasonable location + timing OR child sighting with partial details
verification_guidelines.low_confidence: Vague details, implausible location/timing, no child sighting
verification_guidelines.spam_indicators: Duplicate reports, impossible timelines, conflicting details, known hoax patterns
